scripts.drop-db: echo "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS vietnamese" | mysql -u root -h mysql_vi -ppassword && exit 0
scripts.create-db: echo "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS vietnamese CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;" | mysql -u root -h mysql_vi -ppassword && exit 0
scripts.apply-schema-and-data-and-changes: cat db/*.sql | mysql -u root -h mysql_vi -ppassword --default-character-set=utf8mb4 vietnamese && exit 0
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run apply-schema-and-data-and-changes
